# DeviceActivityResults.Iterator

**Class**

An asynchronous iterator for filtered device activity.

## Declaration

```swift
class Iterator<IteratorElement>
```

## Instance Methods

- **next()**: Asynchronously advances to the next element and returns it, or ends the sequence if there is no next element.

## Conforms To

- AsyncIteratorProtocol

items.description: Asynchronously advances to the next element and returns it, or ends the sequence if there is no next element.
items.name: next()
